no-conflict-scenario.description: Work order scheduled with no conflicts with maintenance windows
expectedExplanation: Work order scheduled successfully with no conflicts

shift-conflict-scenario.description: Work center has no shift for initial date, work order gets rescheduled

reason: No shift available on initial date

expectedExplanation: Work order rescheduled to next available shift

maintenance-conflict-scenario.description: Work order splits around maintenance window and spans multiple shifts
expectedExplanation: Work order rescheduled to next available shift

partial-fit-scenario.description: Work order partially fits in remaining shift after maintenance
expectedExplanation: Work order rescheduled to next available shift

full-shift-blocked-scenario.description: Full shift blocked by maintenance, work order moves to next shift and spans multiple days
expectedExplanation: Work order rescheduled to next available shift
